verses.verse: שִׁמְעוּ־ <S%H8085><s%> Hear זֹ֨את <S%H2063><s%> O הַכֹּהֲנִ֜ים <S%H3548><s%> ye this O priests וְהַקְשִׁ֣יבוּ ׀ <S%H7181><s%> and hearken בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> ye house יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וּבֵ֤ית <S%H1004><s%> O house הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> of the king הַאֲזִ֔ינוּ <S%H238><s%> and give ye ear כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for לָכֶ֖ם הַמִּשְׁפָּ֑ט <S%H4941><s%> for judgment כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for פַח֙ <S%H6341><s%> [is] toward you because ye have been a snare הֱיִיתֶ֣ם <S%H1961><s%> have been לְמִצְפָּ֔ה <S%H4709><s%> on Mizpah וְרֶ֖שֶׁת <S%H7568><s%> and a net פְּרוּשָׂ֥ה <S%H6566><s%> spread עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on תָּבֽוֹר׃ <S%H8396><s%> upon Tabor

וְשַׁחֲטָ֥ה <S%H7819><s%> to make slaughter שֵׂטִ֖ים <S%H7846><s%> And the revolters הֶעְמִ֑יקוּ <S%H6009><s%> are profound וַאֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I מוּסָ֥ר <S%H4148><s%> though I [have been] a rebuker לְכֻלָּֽם׃ <S%H3605><s%> all

אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I יָדַ֣עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> I know אֶפְרַ֔יִם <S%H669><s%> Ephraim וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> and Israel לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> is not נִכְחַ֣ד <S%H3582><s%> is not hid מִמֶּ֑נִּי <S%H4480><s%> at כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> For עַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> now הִזְנֵ֣יתָ <S%H2181><s%> thou committest whoredom אֶפְרַ֔יִם <S%H669><s%> from me for now O Ephraim נִטְמָ֖א <S%H2930><s%> is defiled יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> [and] Israel

לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> will not יִתְּנוּ֙ <S%H5414><s%> They will not frame מַ֣עַלְלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H4611><s%> their doings לָשׁ֖וּב <S%H7725><s%> to turn אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֱלֹֽהֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> unto their God כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For ר֤וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> for the spirit זְנוּנִים֙ <S%H2183><s%> of whoredoms בְּקִרְבָּ֔ם <S%H7130><s%> [is] in the midst וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יָדָֽעוּ׃ <S%H3045><s%> of them and they have not known

וְעָנָ֥ה <S%H6030><s%> doth testify גְאֽוֹן־ <S%H1347><s%> And the pride יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בְּפָנָ֑יו <S%H6440><s%> to his face וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <S%H3478><s%> therefore shall Israel וְאֶפְרַ֗יִם <S%H669><s%> and Ephraim יִכָּֽשְׁלוּ֙ <S%H3782><s%> fall בַּעֲוֹנָ֔ם <S%H5771><s%> in their iniquity כָּשַׁ֥ל <S%H3782><s%> also shall fall גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah עִמָּֽם׃ <S%H5973><s%> with

בְּצֹאנָ֣ם <S%H6629><s%> with their flocks וּבִבְקָרָ֗ם <S%H1241><s%> and with their herds יֵֽלְכ֛וּ <S%H1980><s%> will go לְבַקֵּ֥שׁ <S%H1245><s%> to seek אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> they will not יִמְצָ֑אוּ <S%H4672><s%> but they shall not find חָלַ֖ץ <S%H2502><s%> [him] he hath withdrawn מֵהֶֽם׃ <S%H1992><s%> against

בַּיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> against the LORD בָּגָ֔דוּ <S%H898><s%> They have dealt treacherously כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for בָנִ֥ים <S%H1121><s%> children זָרִ֖ים <S%H2114><s%> strange יָלָ֑דוּ <S%H3205><s%> for they have begotten עַתָּ֛ה <S%H6258><s%> Now יֹאכְלֵ֥ם <S%H398><s%> devour חֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> now shall a month אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with חֶלְקֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H2506><s%> them with their portions ס

תִּקְע֤וּ <S%H8628><s%> Blow שׁוֹפָר֙ <S%H7782><s%> ye the cornet בַּגִּבְעָ֔ה <S%H1390><s%> in Gibeah חֲצֹצְרָ֖ה <S%H2689><s%> [and] the trumpet בָּרָמָ֑ה <S%H7414><s%> in Ramah הָרִ֙יעוּ֙ <S%H7321><s%> cry aloud בֵּ֣ית אָ֔וֶן <S%H1007><s%> [at] Bethaven אַחֲרֶ֖יךָ <S%H310><s%> after בִּנְיָמִֽין׃ <S%H1144><s%> thee O Benjamin

אֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H669><s%> Ephraim לְשַׁמָּ֣ה <S%H8047><s%> shall be desolate תִֽהְיֶ֔ה <S%H1961><s%> will become בְּי֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day תּֽוֹכֵחָ֑ה <S%H8433><s%> of rebuke בְּשִׁבְטֵי֙ <S%H7626><s%> among the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הוֹדַ֖עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> have I made known נֶאֱמָנָֽה׃ <S%H539><s%> that which shall surely be

הָיוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> have become שָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> The princes יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah כְּמַסִּיגֵ֖י <S%H5253><s%> were like them that remove גְּב֑וּל <S%H1366><s%> the bound עֲלֵיהֶ֕ם <S%H5921><s%> on אֶשְׁפּ֥וֹךְ <S%H8210><s%> [therefore] I will pour out כַּמַּ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> upon them like water עֶבְרָתִֽי׃ <S%H5678><s%> my wrath

עָשׁ֥וּק <S%H6217><s%> oppressed אֶפְרַ֖יִם <S%H669><s%> Ephraim רְצ֣וּץ <S%H7533><s%> [and] broken מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <S%H4941><s%> in judgment כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> Because הוֹאִ֔יל <S%H2974><s%> because he willingly הָלַ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> walked אַחֲרֵי־ <S%H310><s%> after צָֽו׃ <S%H6673><s%> the commandment

וַאֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am כָעָ֖שׁ <S%H6211><s%> as a moth לְאֶפְרָ֑יִם <S%H669><s%> Therefore [will] I [be] unto Ephraim וְכָרָקָ֖ב <S%H7538><s%> as rottenness לְבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> and to the house יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah

וַיַּ֨רְא <S%H7200><s%> saw אֶפְרַ֜יִם <S%H669><s%> When Ephraim אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חָלְי֗וֹ <S%H2483><s%> his sickness וִֽיהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> and Judah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מְזֹר֔וֹ <S%H4205><s%> [saw] his wound וַיֵּ֤לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went אֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H669><s%> Ephraim אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַשּׁ֔וּר <S%H804><s%> to the Assyrian וַיִּשְׁלַ֖ח <S%H7971><s%> and sent אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> to king יָרֵ֑ב <S%H3377><s%> Jareb וְה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not יוּכַל֙ <S%H3201><s%> yet could לִרְפֹּ֣א <S%H7495><s%> he not heal לָכֶ֔ם וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Or יִגְהֶ֥ה <S%H1455><s%> you nor cure מִכֶּ֖ם <S%H4480><s%> at מָזֽוֹר׃ <S%H4205><s%> you of your wound

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אָנֹכִ֤י <S%H595><s%> I כַשַּׁ֙חַל֙ <S%H7826><s%> as a lion לְאֶפְרַ֔יִם <S%H669><s%> For I [will be] unto Ephraim וְכַכְּפִ֖יר <S%H3715><s%> and as a young lion לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> to the house יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah אֲנִ֨י <S%H589><s%> I אֲנִ֤י <S%H589><s%> I אֶטְרֹף֙ <S%H2963><s%> I [even] I will tear וְאֵלֵ֔ךְ <S%H1980><s%> and go אֶשָּׂ֖א <S%H5375><s%> I will take away וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> and there מַצִּֽיל׃ <S%H5337><s%> and none shall rescue

אֵלֵ֤ךְ <S%H1980><s%> will go אָשׁ֙וּבָה֙ <S%H7725><s%> [and] return אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מְקוֹמִ֔י <S%H4725><s%> to my place עַ֥ד <S%H5704><s%> against אֲשֶֽׁר־ <S%H834><s%> they יֶאְשְׁמ֖וּ <S%H816><s%> till they acknowledge their offence וּבִקְשׁ֣וּ <S%H1245><s%> and seek פָנָ֑י <S%H6440><s%> my face בַּצַּ֥ר <S%H6862><s%> in their affliction לָהֶ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> they יְשַׁחֲרֻֽנְנִי׃ <S%H7836><s%> they will seek me early
